channel.title: Release Notes on TravelgateX Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Release Notes on TravelgateX Documentation

item.title: Changelog
item.description: Easily accessible log of notable changes to Alerts-X 2019-06-12 Fixed an error that was causing an unsuccessful alert create or update to set clients, suppliers and accesses to the alert for Travelgate Teams users. 2019-06-11 Fixed an error to return all the events of the alerts. 2019-06-06 Added /Health to check service status. 2019-05-23 Alerts-X product documentation is available

item.title: GraphQL Schema breaking changes
item.description: Changes history of deprecated notes previously announced No deletions to date
